title: Wheat flour prices increased with immediate effect
body_lines: The Prima Ceylon (Pvt) Limited and Serendib Flour Mills (Pvt) Ltd have decided to increase the price of wheat flour by Rs. 38 with immediate effect.
Senior officials from the companies said that the decision was taken due to the highest depreciation of the Sri Lankan rupee against the US dollar. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
